hypothesis_slo: K posrednemu izoblikovanju šolske politike pripomore uporaba centraliziranega sistema, pri katerem sodelujejo starši in ostali krajani, medtem ko decentraliziran sistem spodbuja njihovo neposredno vključenost.
premise_eng: A centralised system involves parents and other citizens indirectly in school policy-making, but decentralisation increases their direct participation.
hypothesis_eng: The use of a centralised system involving parents and other local residents helps to shape school policy indirectly, while a decentralised system encourages their direct involvement.
label: entailment

premise_slo: Večina delničarjev ga je potrdila za predsednika, Janez Pestotnik pa je postal novi predsednik nadzornega sveta Banke Karantanija.
hypothesis_slo: Banka Karantanija je po izboru večine delničarjev dobila novega predsednika nadzornega sveta, in sicer Janeza Pestotnika.
premise_eng: A majority of shareholders approved him as Chairman and Janez Pestotnik became the new Chairman of the Supervisory Board of Banka Karantanija.
hypothesis_eng: Banka Karantanija has a new Chairman of the Supervisory Board, Janez Pestotnik, following the election of the majority of shareholders.
label: entailment
